analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ na hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā soḷasa, ārammaṇe dvādasa, adhipatiyā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā soḷasa ārammaṇe dvādasa adhipatiyā
terasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate soḷasa

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
